name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are very comfortable and very sturdy. But they are on the small side and look like childrens' furniture. I think they will work well as extra seating, but won't be using them for everyday seating.
reviews.title: 23 August 2012

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: a little narrow but still comfortable & sturdy! All I had to do was screw on the seats, frame is one piece welded and strong. Definitely would buy again!
reviews.title: good value, nice looking & comfortable

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a couple extra chairs for my salon waiting room. These were exactly what I was looking for. They look classy. You can't beat the price for the quality.
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: I bought these chairs for my room, they are very much well built for rough usage . Walmart shipped me within 4 days in free shipping. I am very satisfied with them.
reviews.title: very stout and durable

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: So far the chairs are well worth the money. They seem to be very well built and quite sturdy. If the chair seats hold up ( THE FABRIC ) then they are excellent, only time will tell. I bought a total of six and so far very pleased. They are also very easy to put together. Four screws and you're done. ( to attach the seat ) The only improvement that I would recommend is to make the seat just a little bit wider. It is ok the way it is but wider would make it excellent. I do recommend the chairs the way they are.
reviews.title: COST A LITTLE------------ WORTH A LOT
